hero.title: With One Click
hero.subtitle: Invite your loved ones in the way that suits you and welcome your guests

footer.title: Note
list: The number of supervisors is determined based on the number of guests, with the option to request additional supervisors for an extra fee.
There may be additional fees for the supervisory team depending on the event location, and you will be informed of any fees before confirming the booking.
Prices are based on the number of guests, not the number of invitations sent.

rows: Supervisory team (number of team members based on the number of guests and package price)
Open multiple accounts and distribute the number of guests among them.
One invitation card integrated with an entry barcode
Invitation card - Entry - Thank you - Snapchat lens
Design according to the event theme
Write the guest's name and the number of invitees
Select the number of attendees (e.g., if 5 invitees are specified, the guest can choose the number of attendees out of 5 people)
Send automated reminders and thank you messages, A welcome message upon guest entry
